td.content: s:pt complained of Kidney. pt denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. she is a 30 year old white female medical transcriptionist. Denies ever using tobacco denies any alcohol use o:Height 160 cm, Weight 91.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis.

td.content: s:white female aged 31 Ys presents with 14 months history of moderate feeling of tiredness. pt also reports increased frequency of moderate denial of blood disorders, moderate yellowing of eyes. Denies ever using tobacco denies any alcohol use o:Height 160 cm, Weight 92.9 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cyclophosphamide - 100 mg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

td.content: s:patient presents with Kidney for 2 weeks. she is a 32 yr old female. o:Height 160 cm, Weight 92.5 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

s:pt presents with progressive moderate yellowing of eyes, moderate feeling of tiredness and moderate denial of blood disorders for past 7 days. patient is a F medical transcriptionist aged 32 yrs. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 161 cm, Weight 93.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

td.content: s:F medical transcriptionist aged 32 yrs presents with moderate feeling of tiredness for more than 7 weeks. o:Height 160 cm, Weight 92.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Skin = pallor, Skin = pale, no petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed mycophenolate mofetil - 500 mg daily in divided doses, and ordered RBC transfusion - circulatory system.
